name: Pathway: Desire
description:
With beautiful retro pixel art, Pathway: Desire tells the story of a young woman in a quest of discovery. Join her as she explores this minimalistic dungeon crawler with heavy emphasis in character customization.

Controls:

- Arrow keys Movement
- Z Action/accept
- X Open menu/cancel
- A Skip dialogue
- Q/W Change character in some menus (equip screen, skill screen)
